DOC.brief_summary: A national survey of current practices, preferred drug and technique choices for obstetric anesthesia and analgesia in Czech Republic and Slovak Republic.
DOC.brief_title: Obstetric Anaesthesia And Analgesia Month Attributes - International
DOC.detailed_description: A one month-long project monitoring an obstetric anesthesia practices in obstetric/anesthesia departments throughout the Czech Republic. Electronic Case Report Form (eCRF) is used to collect data on all obstetric anesthesia procedures in peripartal period and obstetric and anesthesia complications. All consecutive cases in each participating center during the study period are recorded. Each record is related to parturient and contains the following sections: history, form of labour analgesia, type of anesthesia for Cesarean section and anesthesia in third stage of labor.
DOC.criteria: Women in labor undergoing anesthesia care not meeting inclusion criteria
